entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 13.
